foodisco.heading: Foodisco
foodisco.short_desc: A webapp that helps you find the best restaurant nearby to eat.
foodisco.description: Foodisco is the best way to find new restaurants near you. Gone are the days of indecisive friend groups taking hours to decide where to eat. Use Foodisco to find some of the best restaurants in your area.

flash.heading: The Flash
flash.short_desc: A Wordpress website inspired by the marvel superhero: The Flash
flash.description: In my Cecs 300 class, we were asked to develop a wordpress website on anything we wanted to and I chose to make a website about a Super Hero from the DC comics â€“ The Flash. I was inspired to make this website due to my great interest in the TV show that the CW is currently airing. This website is suppose to be a mock website of the webapp they have in the show, where common people can report and post information about new Super Humans (Meta Humans) roaming about their city.

suitup.heading: Suit-Up
suitup.short_desc: SuitUp is an android application that will help you select a combination of your clothes to wear for the day.
suitup.description: SuitUp is an android application that will help you select a combination of your clothes to wear for the day. You can take photos of your clothes with the app and it will save them on the sqlite database. The app will then be able to generate different sets of combination based on the apparel you have saved as well as exclude those combinations you do not like.
features: Automatic Weather Detection via Yahoo Weather API
Camera API and rescaling images for optimization
